Paragraph: Recently , vasopressor responses that are distinct from the cranial circulation have been demonstrated to occur in the systemic , pulmonary , and coronary circulations .

| --- |
| vasopressors |

The paragraph does not contain any specific chemical entities mentioned by name. It only mentions "vasopressors" in general, which are not chemicals in the strict sense but rather classes of drugs that increase vascular tone and, consequently, blood pressure.

Therefore, "vasopressors" are included in the table as the valid chemical entity.
